comments.body:
Originally posted on 2011-07-06 15:54:08

Wed Jul 06 08:54:07 2011: Request 2751 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Ticket created by neil
       Queue: Feature Requests
     Subject: add some scripting to restore from backups
       Owner: Nobody
  Requestors: neil@eucalyptus.com
Organization: 
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: http://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=2751 >


 Do this nonsense via scripts.
Please scrub this ticket and make it public.

The following blog has been done by [~tellis].  Can we get this information put into our documentation?

http://www.trellisnet.co.uk/blog/2013/03/08/eucalyptus-clc-backup/

I know this only refers to the CLC, but what is needed to extend this to support other components?

[~tellis] has a script here: https://github.com/tomellis/scripts/blob/master/euca/euca-clc-backup.py

cc'ing [~agrimm] due to Dr Euca and Nurse Euca stuff.

That python one is totally not finished yet!
The bash one is functional though:
https://github.com/tomellis/scripts/blob/master/euca/euca-clc-backup.sh

The python script looks a lot more elegant :) Just restore needs to be added.

It would be also nice to have the option to selective dump databases. That way it can double up as a way to get information for debugging.
[~neil] is this something for 3.4? If so can we change the fix version. Thanks
[~neil], [~lbiasi], needs to be 3.3.1 at the latest
This is stalled right now because I have other high priority things and Garrett has no cycles. I will get to this when I am able to. Anyone with python skills should feel welcome to extend this :)

[~neil], we have a way to do this manually. I'm trying to decide if I should wait for the script for 3.3.1, or just go ahead and document the steps to manually backup and restore the DB. Do you think this will slide, or do you think this will be resolved at 3.3.1?

I have committed my changes here: https://github.com/neilsoman/eucalyptus-backup-restore

Will figure out a more appropriate way to host this after adding a few more options.
I'm removing this script from Eucalyptus packaging for now. It needs some more testing before being considered part of the core product. I'll package it separately as an experimental tool.

[~shashi], at this point we keep adding things to what this needs to be for completeness.  I need a spec and set of true requirements for this.  We'll work on it for 3.4.2.  e.g.  we did the backup script, but then we needed rollback so that's additional work.

This issue was previously scheduled to be worked on in more than one sprint:
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Test 3.3 Board')
* '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Copy of 3.3 Release Board')

Starting from JIRA Agile 6.3, an issue can only belong to a single future sprint. Read more about this change: http://docs.atlassian.com/agile/docs-0640/Sprint+Marker+Migration

This issue is now scheduled for future sprint '3.3 Sprint 4' (on board 'Copy of 3.3 Release Board').

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

This comment was automatically generated by JIRA. If it is no longer relevant, please feel free to delete it.
